issue.title: [Rust] Ensure a successful MIRI Run on CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11715](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11715). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now we have the MIRI check setup to pass even of `cargo miri` returns an error.

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.github/workflows/rust.yml#L263-L264
```Java

# Ignore MIRI errors until we can get a clean run
          cargo miri test || true
```

Goal is to make MIRI pass and then remove this check in CI
